deprecated_port_80.title: Deprecated Port 80 Configuration
deprecated_port_80.description:
Your RENKEI motor '{entry_title}' is configured to use port {current_port}, but RENKEI motors use port 17002 for communication. This configuration may cause connection issues.

Click 'Submit' to automatically update to the correct port.

connection_unstable.title: Unstable Connection Detected
connection_unstable.description:
Your RENKEI motor '{entry_title}' has reconnected {reconnect_count} times, indicating an unstable network connection.

Click 'Submit' to apply more conservative connection settings that may improve stability.

motor_error.title: Motor Error Detected
motor_error.description:
Your RENKEI motor '{entry_title}' reported error code {error_code}: {error_description}.

This may indicate a hardware issue that requires attention. Please check the motor installation and wiring.
